sentences.en: A class must implement all members an interface which it directly inherits.
sentences.cn: 类必须实现它从中直接继承的接口的所有成员.

sentences.en: Congress provided $ 400 million to implement these management programs.
sentences.cn: 国会拨款4亿美元实施这一管理项目.

sentences.en: Implement new analysis methods and SOP under instructions from TE.
sentences.cn: 在技术工程师的辅导下使用新的分析方法和检测规程.

sentences.en: Implement process changes and update in line process parameters.
sentences.cn: 实施工艺更改和更新在线设备参数.

sentences.en: It can reduce labor, tractor and total implement costs, with possible increased size of operation.
sentences.cn: 它可以尽可能的增加操作范围,以减少劳动力拖拉机和总的工具费用.

sentences.en: Leadership is about the ability to implement change.
sentences.cn: 领导才能就是要有实施变革的能力。

sentences.en: Quills were the chief writing implement from the 6 th century AD until the advent of steel pens in the mid 19 th century.
sentences.cn: 从公元6世纪到19世纪中期钢笔出现以前,羽毛笔是主要的书写工具.

sentences.en: Sixth, continue to implement the responsibility system for administrative law enforcement.
sentences.cn: 继续深入推行行政执法责任制.

sentences.en: Such an operation is problematic to implement and explain.
sentences.cn: 这样的操作实现和解释起来都有问题.

sentences.en: The best implement for digging a garden is a spade.
sentences.cn: 在花园里挖土的最好工具是铁锹.

sentences.en: The government promised to implement a new system to control financial loan institutions.
sentences.cn: 政府许诺要实施新的制度来控制金融贷款机构。

sentences.en: The nodes implement function by adopting host - guest in testing instantaneous field.
sentences.cn: 瞬态场的测试节点采用上、下位机模式实现其功能.

sentences.en: The sole reason the Recycle Bin exists is to implement an undo facility for deleted files.
sentences.cn: 回收站存在的唯一理由就是实现文件删除的撤销工具.

sentences.en: Today all desktop and notebook hard disk drives implement the security features.
sentences.cn: 现在所有的桌面计算机和笔记本电脑硬盘都采用该安全功能.

sentences.en: We are only going to implement things at the bare minimum.
sentences.cn: 我们只尽小地实现事物.

sentences.en: We have decided to implement the committee’s recommendations in full.
sentences.cn: 我们已决定全面实施委员会提出的建议。

sentences.en: We implement the principle of assuming responsibility for mistakes.
sentences.cn: 我们贯彻对错误承担责任的原则.

words.tran_cn: 器具的；有帮助的；可作为工具的

trans.tran_cn: 工具，器械，家具，手段，[法]履行（契约等）
trans.tran_en: a tool, especially one used for outdoor physical work
to take action or make changes that you have officially decided should happen

trans.tran_cn: 实施，执行，使生效，实现，落实（政策），把…填满
trans.tran_en: to take action or make changes that you have officially decided should happen
